definition: China National Farmers' Games (sports meeting for peasants held every 4 years since 1988)
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Peasant participate in the province in 2006 by the second group five animals.
sentences.chinese: 2006年參加全省農運會獲集體五禽戲第二名。
